name: Rougle
description:
An emoji roguelike made for #7DRL

ARROW KEYS: Move
ENTER: Interact
SPACE: Wait a turn
1 - 6: Use inventory slots

❤️ - Health. Run out of this and you die
💰 - Cash. Spend it in the store.
💪 - Strengh. How hard you hit.
⛹️ - Agility. Chance to dodge attacks.

Try to get to the 6th level and find the  🏆

There is a new dungeon every day and you only get 1 shot. Once you have played you will need to wait until tomorrow to have another go at getting the 🏆

Unfortunately, the share feature does not work in the web build. If you really want to share your scores (and are on Windows), there's a desktop build you can try until I can find a solution.
